WindowMozInnerScreenX.summary:
Gets the X coordinate of the top-left corner of the window's viewport, in screen
coordinates.

blockquote.para: This coordinate is reported in CSS pixels, not in hardware pixels. That means it can be affected by the zoom level; to compute the actual number of physical screen pixels, you should use the nsIDOMWindowUtils.screenPixelsPerCSSPixel property.

WindowMozInnerScreenX.value: The window.mozInnerScreenX property is a floating point, read-only value; it has no default value.
